mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.book_id AS bookId, b.title, COALESCE(b.thumbnail, '') AS thumbnail, r.rating, r.content, r.creation_date AS creationDate, CASE WHEN l.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END AS liked FROM book_review r JOIN book b ON r.book_id = b.id LEFT JOIN like_list l ON l.target_id = r.id AND l.user_id = #{userId} AND l.like_type = 1 WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND YEAR(r.creation_date) = #{year} ORDER BY r.creation_date DESC
